data.name: 方块地牢
data.detailed_description:
Introduction to the game: [/] [/]

"Square dungeon" is a dungeon adventure word game.

game background: [/] [/]

I woke up from the dungeon and didn't know where I came from to explore the mystery of my life experience.

game features: [/] [/]

1. There are 16 initial classes, and each class has stunts in 4 different directions.

2. Flexible choice of skills. There is no limit to your career. Your imagination is the only limit.

3. Explore the secrets in the depths of the dungeon on a random map. Each exploration has a different experience.

4. Find hidden levels in the dungeon and challenge powerful enemies to obtain special rewards.

5. You need to be braver and braver in order to constantly challenge higher levels.

developer's words: [/] [/]

Xiaowu: the dungeon of the box is the first work that I have completed independently in the form of a pure blueprint in four years of self-study (learning and doing in my spare time) driven by my personal hobby. I hope you like it.

QQ group: 576872409

data.short_description: "Square dungeon" is a word independent game of Dungeon exploration. "Amnesiacs" wake up in an ancient "dungeon". The only way to find their identity and memory is to go to a higher dungeon. In the process, they should make choices and grasp their own destiny.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: 无要求
  • Graphics: 无要求
  • Sound Card: 无要求
